text: The NFL Top 100 Players of 2013 was the third season of the series. It ended with reigning NFL MVP Adrian Peterson being ranked #1, while Super Bowl MVP Joe Flacco was ranked #19. ==Episode list== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Episode No. !! Air date !!
